title: News24.com | FAKE NEWS | No, Covid-19 testing kits are not contaminated
description: A fake video claiming that Covid-19 testing kits are possibly contaminated, has been condemned by the Eastern Cape Department of Health.
content:
A fake video relating to Covid-19 which has emerged, claiming testing kits are possibly contaminated, has been condemned by the Eastern Cape Department of Health.
